markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Clairaudience](/Spells.aspx?ID=1465)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Scrying" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=141" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 320 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[Nameless](/Deities.aspx?ID=598)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You create an [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) floating ear at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). It can't move, but you can hear through the ear as if using your normal auditory senses.
name: Clairaudience

---

<summary>
Hear through an invisible magical sensor.
</summary>
summary: Hear through an invisible magical sensor.
summary_markdown: Hear through an invisible magical sensor.
text: Clairaudience Source Player Core pg. 320 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deity Nameless Cast 1 minute Range 500 feet Duration 10 minutes --- You create an invisible floating ear at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). It can't move, but you can hear through the ear as if using your normal auditory senses.
